root.name: Moraff's World
root.description: OverviewMoraff's World is a dungeon-crawling RPG with a randomly-generated world. It was created by Steve Moraff at Moraffware and distributed as shareware. It was one of the earliest games to support high-resolution SVGA graphics.RacesHuman, elf, dwarf, hobbit, gnome, ogre, sprite, imp.ClassesFighter, worshipper, monk, wizard, priest, sage, mage.Object of the GamePlayers explore dungeons and fight monsters to both gain experience and acquire items. There are more than 40 monster types in the game.At 8 dungeon levels there resides a much more powerful monster than others that reside on the floor, with the Red Dragon King on level 200 being the final boss. The game does not have a formal end, and play can continue after defeating the Dragon King.
